about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate about technology with a hands-on approach to solving real-world problems
about.journey1: I started my IT career at 18 in tech support, driven by curiosity and a passion for understanding how technology works. Over the years, I've worked my way up to become the sole network and system administrator for three mid-sized company locations.
about.journey2: What sets me apart is my hands-on approach to learning and problem-solving. Rather than following traditional academic paths, I've built my expertise through real-world experience, personal projects, and continuous self-improvement.
about.journey3: From building home server infrastructures to developing IoT solutions for everyday problems, I believe in learning by doing. This practical experience has given me a deep understanding of both the technical and business sides of IT operations.

systemAdmin.title: System Administration
systemAdmin.description: Linux/Windows server management, virtualization, and infrastructure automation

problemSolving.title: Problem Solving

qualifications.title: Qualifications & Experience
qualifications.subtitle: Building expertise through hands-on experience and continuous learning
qualifications.experienceNote: My Approach: While my career path may seem non-traditional, each role has built upon the last, giving me a comprehensive understanding of IT from the ground up. I believe practical experience and continuous learning are just as valuable as formal education.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to discuss opportunities and bring innovative solutions to your team
contact.description: I'm always interested in discussing new opportunities, challenging projects, and innovative solutions. Whether you're looking for a dedicated system administrator or someone who can bring fresh perspectives to your IT infrastructure, I'd love to hear from you.
